txt.en:
'Greetings Admin [placeholder]. I am here to assist you in presenting a fun Live Op to players. 

'All you need do is speak with me one more time and I will launch you to the Lone-lands where you can join the raid built for Ost Guruth. 

'If you have not already, please open the admin panel and switch to the WORLD EVENTS tab. Refresh the screen and then filter for we_liveops_ostguruth_raid after finding this event, select it and use the set true button to activate the event.

'Happy hunting!'
'Greetings admin. You are about to enter the Trestlebridge session play. Please be sure that your character name is Glothrok, remember to delete this character at the end of the session.'

You are the Orc Gropor, forged in the fires of Angmar and part of the Tarkr√Æp Orcs. You hunger for Man-flesh and will stop at nothing to earn the favour of Angmar by destroying the Men holed-up in the village of Ost Guruth.

You will be sent to a location to the directly south of Ost Guruth. You will need to move toward the city to join the raid event. This should take approximately 30 minutes if all characters in the area are at equivalent level. Shorter if they are not; remember you are an Orc and should not speak to players.
